item.description:
Master sales trainer Eric Lofholm has an amazing opportunity you don't want to miss!

Every year he guides a group of people to create their sales and marketing plan for the New Year.

This year he is GIFTING a 5 week Sales & Marketing Planning series to help you create the best plan you have ever created...even if you have never done a written plan before.  This is a live teleconference, so you can listen wherever you are.

If you can't make the live calls ALL calls will be recorded and automatically sent to you.  Each call comes with comprehensive notes teaching you step-by-step how to create your best plan ever.  He has guided over 1,500 people through this process.

Here is a short video that explains the gift:  http://vimeo.com/ericlofholm/review/53554335/b2fd9166b5

Live calls start on Thursday, November 29 at 7 pm ET.

Sign up:  http://saleschampion.com/go.html?p=ias&w=2013Plan

Even if you miss the initial 5 weeks of live calls you can still sign up through the end of January and listen to the recordings!

No charge for this amazing jump start on your business.
item.name: 2013 Sales & Marketing Planning
